com.brunomnsilva.smartgraph.graphview

Class SmartGraphProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brunomnsilva.smartgraph.graphview.SmartGraphProperties

  • public class SmartGraphProperties
extends java.lang.Object
    Properties used by SmartGraphPanel. Default file is given by the DEFAULT_FILE property.
    See Also:
    SmartGraphPanel, SmartGraphVertex, SmartGraphEdge

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SmartGraphProperties()
      Uses default properties file.
      SmartGraphProperties(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
      Reads properties from the desired input stream.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getAttractionForce()
      Returns a property that indicates the attraction force to use in the automatic force-based layout.
      double getAttractionScale()
      Returns a property that indicates the attraction scale to use in the automatic force-based layout.
      double getRepulsionForce()
      Returns a property that indicates the repulsion force to use in the automatic force-based layout.
      boolean getUseEdgeArrow()
      Returns a property that indicates whether a SmartArrow should be attached to an edge.
      boolean getUseEdgeLabel()
      Returns a property that indicates whether an edge has a SmartLabel attached to it.
      boolean getUseEdgeTooltip()
      Returns a property that indicates whether an edge has a tooltip installed.
      boolean getUseVertexLabel()
      Returns a property that indicates whether a vertex has a SmartLabel attached to it.
      boolean getUseVertexTooltip()
      Returns a property that indicates whether a vertex has a tooltip installed.
      boolean getVertexAllowUserMove()
      Returns a property that indicates whether a vertex can be moved freely by the user.
      double getVertexRadius()
      Returns a property that indicates the radius of each vertex.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
